citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:20pm on
16-Apr-19.
Both facility representatives were away on exhibition related activity. Was able to talk to one representative on the
phone-neither available to do inspection today. Discussed setting up optimal hours during call.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:20pm on
16-Apr-19.
Both facility representatives were away on exhibition related activity. Was able to talk to one representative on the
phone-neither available to do inspection today. Discussed setting up optimal hours during call.
